body_html:
Note - before any one asks, compiling libtensorflow_cc.so with simpler bazel build flags like :

bazel build -c opt --copt=-mavx //tensorflow:libtensorflow_cc.so

Results in similar delta's in performance albeit a few percentage points slower all around. In other words, the phenomena appears to exist regardless of my attempts at optimizing the build.

body:
Note  - before any one asks, compiling libtensorflow_cc.so with simpler bazel build flags like :

`bazel build -c opt --copt=-mavx //tensorflow:libtensorflow_cc.so`

Results in similar delta's in performance albeit a few percentage points slower all around. In other words, the phenomena appears to exist regardless of my attempts at optimizing the build.
